(xiii) CUAB requires Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics.  
(xiv) OOU requires Chemistry and any two (2) of Physics, 
Mathematics, Biology, Agricultural Science and Geography.  
(xv) FUPRE requires Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.  
(xvi) ODUDUWA accepts Agricultural Science in place of Biology  
(xvii) MAUTY requires Chemistry and any two (2) of Physics, 
Biology and Mathematics.
